communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: July 2017 NYPD Academy class Curriculum
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all courses in the NYC Police Academy recruit training program curriculum for the July 2017 Academy Class. Please include course names, hours recruits spend in each course, and any associated statistics (including but not limited to pass/fail rates and remedial rates).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Johnandrew Cusmano

communications.subject: NYC.gov - NYC.ID Confirm Your Email Address
communications.communication:
You have just created a user account with City of New York. If it was created in error, deactivate your account. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/deactivate.htm?guid=c1b8783647aa49ec99942e80563ca0ca&token=iCQHXmesUBtgnXASrkDaOiypjRdLMtNnBuaZcUdHcnebwAGXoZmdKpARUtTjfrgW&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv) to confirm your email address. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=c1b8783647aa49ec99942e80563ca0ca&token=iCQHXmesUBtgnXASrkDaOiypjRdLMtNnBuaZcUdHcnebwAGXoZmdKpARUtTjfrgW&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) Click this link 
If the above link does not work, paste the following address into your browser: https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=c1b8783647aa49ec99942e80563ca0ca&token=iCQHXmesUBtgnXASrkDaOiypjRdLMtNnBuaZcUdHcnebwAGXoZmdKpARUtTjfrgW&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=c1b8783647aa49ec99942e80563ca0ca&token=iCQHXmesUBtgnXASrkDaOiypjRdLMtNnBuaZcUdHcnebwAGXoZmdKpARUtTjfrgW&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) 
We ask you to confirm your email to ensure our emails will be delivered. This is the address you will log in with, and the address to which we will deliver all email messages regarding invitations and requests, and other system mail. 
You can change your email address at any time, but will only be able to log in with it once you have confirmed the email address by clicking the link. 
Thank you for using NYC.gov. 
Do Not Reply - Automatic Email
